question: A man had 16000 Rs., part of which he lent at 4% and the rest at 5% per annum simple interest. If the total interest received was 700 Rs.  In one year, the money lent at 4% per annum was :
explanation:
Let the sum lent at 4% = Rs. x 
âˆ´ Amount at 5% = 16000 - x
According to the question, 
$latex \\frac{x\\times 4\\times 1}{100}+\\frac{(16000-x)\\times 5\\times 1}{100} = 700&s=1$
$latex => 4x + 80000-5x = 70000$
$latex => x = 80000 - 70000 = 10000$
Hence option [C] is correct answer.
